name: JavaScript for Beginners
info: This course is designed for those who are new to programming. You'll learn the fundamentals of JavaScript, including variables, loops, functions, and event handling. By the end of the course, you'll be able to build interactive websites and have a solid understanding of how JavaScript works in the browser.

name: React.js Mastery
info: This comprehensive course will take you through React, one of the most popular JavaScript frameworks. From components to hooks, you'll learn how to build dynamic user interfaces. Weâ€™ll also cover best practices for managing state, working with APIs, and optimizing your React app for production.

name: Python for Data Science
info: In this course, you'll learn how to use Python for data analysis and visualization. You'll work with popular libraries like Pandas, NumPy, and Matplotlib, and gain hands-on experience with real-world datasets. This course is perfect for anyone interested in data science, machine learning, or analytics.

name: Full Stack Web Development
info: Become a full-stack developer with this all-in-one course. Learn both front-end (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React) and back-end (Node.js, Express, MongoDB) development. You'll build and deploy full web applications, learning the technologies that power modern websites and web apps.

name: Advanced CSS & Sass
info: Take your CSS skills to the next level with this advanced course. You'll master the art of styling with Sass, Flexbox, Grid, and more. You'll also learn how to optimize your CSS workflow and create responsive layouts that work across all devices.
